solution_line_template: Layla rode {total_mileage}-{track_mileage}=<<{total_mileage}-{track_mileage}={round_trip_to_school_mileage}>>{round_trip_to_school_mileage} miles between home and the high school.

Each leg of the round-trip journey was {round_trip_to_school_mileage}/{legs_in_round_trip}=<<{round_trip_to_school_mileage}/{legs_in_round_trip}={distance_to_high_school}>>{distance_to_high_school} miles.
